scripts.build: npm run build:bff && npm run build:web
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:bff && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:bff && npm run lint:fix:web
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:bff && npm run type-check:web
scripts.test: npm run test:bff && npm run test:web
scripts.clean: npm run clean:bff && npm run clean:web
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/bff && npm install && cd ../../web-app && npm install
